mapper.insert: insert into pm_user_account (user_id, bank_id , acc_type_id ,balance ) values (#{userId},#{bankId},#{accTypId},#{balance})
mapper.select: select FIRST_NAME as firstName, LAST_NAME as lastName, USER_AGE as age, USER_ADDRESS as address, BANK_NAME as bankName, ACC_TYPE as accType, BALANCE as balance from pm_user , pm_bank , pm_acc_type , pm_user_account where pm_user_account.bank_id=pm_bank.bank_id and pm_user_account.user_id=pm_user.user_id and pm_user_account.acc_type_id=pm_acc_type.acc_type_id and pm_user.first_name=#{firstName} and pm_user.last_name=#{lastName} and pm_user.user_age=#{age} and pm_bank.BANK_NAME=#{bankName} and pm_acc_type.ACC_TYPE=#{accType}

select FIRST_NAME as firstName , LAST_NAME as lastName, USER_AGE as age, USER_ADDRESS as address, BANK_NAME as bankName , ACC_TYPE as accType,BALANCE as balance from ( select pm_user.first_name ,pm_user.last_name , pm_user.user_age ,pm_user.user_address , pm_bank.bank_name ,pm_acc_type.acc_type, pm_user_account.balance from pm_user , pm_bank , pm_acc_type , pm_user_account where pm_user_account.bank_id=pm_bank.bank_id and pm_user_account.user_id=pm_user.user_id and pm_user_account.acc_type_id=pm_acc_type.acc_type_id order by pm_user_account.created_date desc ) where ROWNUM <= 10

select FIRST_NAME as firstName, LAST_NAME as lastName, USER_AGE as age, USER_ADDRESS as address, BANK_NAME as bankName, ACC_TYPE as accType, BALANCE as balance from pm_user u,pm_bank b,pm_acc_type a,pm_user_account s where s.bank_id=b.bank_id and s.user_id=u.user_id and s.acc_type_id=a.acc_type_id and b.bank_name like '%'||#{bankName}||'%' and a.acc_type like '%'||#{accType}||'%' order by s.bank_id
